name: ravishingly
content:

in a way that is very beautiful: She was a ravishingly beautiful bride. In the duet, they sang ravishingly.
More examplesFewer examplesThe film is a ravishingly beautiful portrait of the immigrant experience.The buildings are ravishingly colourful.We ate dinner in the hotel's ravishingly glamorous restaurant.The garden is ravishingly pretty.The movie is ravishingly shot throughout.The cellist played so ravishingly it brought tears to my eyes.
